website_summaries.verdict: A reliable dual charger that includes everything needed to keep Wii U remotes powered up.
pros: Charges 2 Wii U remotes at the same time
Priced well enough to purchase more if needed for additional controllers
cons: Charging contacts must be kept clean to ensure good connection

customer_reviews.title: Won't charge batteries
customer_reviews.text: I bought this charger thinking it would be a good one since the batteries are made by a reputable company. The batteries wouldn't charge and the charger would continually blink red. I contacted the company and put in a claim. They replaced both the charger and the batteries but the second set had the exact same issue. They wouldn't charge either! It took several months and emails to get the company to respond to the claim so I decided to buy from another company rather than try again.
customer_reviews.author: Susie J

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a Wiimote charger that works!
customer_reviews.text: I've had two other Wiimote chargers, and both of them were lacking. The first would barely hold a charge. The second was an Energizer that used a contactless pad to charge the remotes. It worked well enough, but after a while one of the batteries died in it, and positioning the Wiimotes on the pad could be fussy. This on the other hand is a dual holster that holds them securely. The batteries certainly last long enough for a few hours' play. This one I can recommend.
customer_reviews.author: -=Rudy=-Top Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Perfect buy
customer_reviews.text: In one year I purchased this item twice. It comes with extra batteries, wii backs and the amount of use our wii is used in the home this item has our vote . The other one prongs just gave out on charging so now my son is using it as a ride for his toys (like a car).
customer_reviews.author: Samaira Truss

customer_reviews.title: Works as Advertised.
customer_reviews.text: We have had this product for about 6 months, and it has worked as advertised. We use to have a charger that they wiis hung from (magnetically) and it looked cool and charged them well, but you had to take them totally out of the protective case. We now use this one because the other died, and this takes up less space. We also leave the protective cases on half way and still plug them into the charger. In the end the real test for this will be battery life, will these last for 2 plus years like the last on did? We will see.
customer_reviews.author: McAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Zero support from Manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: The product died about 3 weeks after the window to return closed. I contacted the manufacturer and they basically stopped responding after saying that they no longer make this product. Nothing more. I have no way to contact the seller and since the product malfunctioned after the window closed, I am out of luck it seems.
customer_reviews.author: Beekay

customer_reviews.title: Been using for 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Works well no complaints. I have mine charging from the wii directly (have keep Wii in standby to charge, or on obviously). You can charge from an outlet as well. I’m not sure if the USB adapter is included better check the included items. If not most people have a few laying around from old cell phones.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Only 1 battery works.
customer_reviews.text: So far only 1 battery pack is still working. The other rechargeable battery stopped working after 1 week. If I can get a replacement battery, I'll update my start review to 5, since the charger works, and it could just be a defective battery. However, I cant contact seller without returning the whole item.
customer_reviews.author: PinkPunk

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy these!
customer_reviews.text: I'd give it 0 stars if I could. My son got this as part of his Xmas gift. He's 5 so he is just getting into video games. We only used it 1 time as he wasn't into his game system yet and then set controllers off to the side. Now that he is really wanting to play more and its only a few months later we try and charge his controllers again and after 1 charge it will not charge the batteries. They sit red for awhile and then fast blink red but never charge. I wish I'd gone elsewhere since I can't get a refund or replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal B

customer_reviews.title: These pay for them selves many times over
customer_reviews.text: First set received had defective batteries - replaced without issue and the second set charges great - beware however - the batteries that come in this 2X kit are smaller capacity than the ones that come in the 3X set - the controllers only last about 3 hrs before going dead where as the others last 4.5 to 5 hrs. Still - these pay for them selves many times over compared to even the best regular batteries.
customer_reviews.author: greenmama

customer_reviews.title: Working ok
customer_reviews.text: Working good a little testy sometime the red charging light will blink so I have to keep taking off the controllers but when it’s working it actually does charge the battery life is like a day and a half full play pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best solution I have found.
customer_reviews.text: We bought one of these about a year or so ago, and recently got another for the other 2 remotes. The batteries are actually of decent quality and after a year still keep their charge just fine. We tried some other cheaper solutions but after a few weeks they would not keep charge, but these have been great.
customer_reviews.author: Nankivels

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good price for a charing station! I'm pretty pleased with this purchase but there is one little catch... You would have to use a separate USB charger and NOT the one on the Wii itself if you plan the charge controllers while the Wii is in sleep mode. If the Wii is in sleep mode, these won't charge like say, PlayStation 3 controllers will charge via USB connected to the console while it's in sleep mode.
customer_reviews.author: Leona Cat

customer_reviews.title: As with all other L-Ion or NiCad batteries DONT LEAVE ...
customer_reviews.text: As with all other L-Ion or NiCad batteries DONT LEAVE IT PLUGGED IN 24/7 if you want the battery to last. Before I go to play I plug the unit into my Anker USB charger. Let the light turn from red to green. Takes about 2-5 minutes if it was fully charged. Then when Im done playing I move the back controller to the front and set the one i was using into the back. I have had no problem with them setting in the cradle or keeping a charge.
customer_reviews.author: James R

customer_reviews.title: Does not last
customer_reviews.text: Worked ok for about 6-9months then the red light would blink and not charge. I cleaned the contacts like the other reviewers mentioned but it only would work for a little while, a day or two, before it would happen again. Even when I get a solid green light the charge would last for less than a minute on one of the batteries.
customer_reviews.author: nicholas myers

customer_reviews.title: PDP Energizer 2X Charging System
customer_reviews.text: These batteries just don't seem to charge. Been charging for almost the day lights still red on both. Also one battery pack keeps popping out of controller since it is hard to push down for some reason.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad battery
customer_reviews.text: I know how things were pretty good at first but I was wrong battery charges but after leaving the receiver it loses battery when I'm not even using it.
customer_reviews.author: David M E

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with original Wii remote.
customer_reviews.text: It didn't work unfortunately, I have the original Wii remotes and the battery pack didn't fit.
customer_reviews.author: Neerhs Aihpos

customer_reviews.title: Never stops charging
customer_reviews.text: Controllers never stop charging, the lights stay always red. I really want it to work, I intended to buy another, but now I don't think I would.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus J.

customer_reviews.title: I really like it.
customer_reviews.text: I like it fine. Sometimes the controller disconnects from the base so i keep an eye on it. You really jave to push hard to get the remotes in but it works great.
customer_reviews.author: priscilla robertson

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work for long at all!
customer_reviews.text: This no longer works! The wire is flimsy and doesnt charge anymore.
customer_reviews.author: K. R.

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars, a “must have” if you owned a WII Mario game
customer_reviews.text: I love this charger and the batteries that came with it. It charges properly and the battery holds the charge very well
customer_reviews.author: Joshua SOSSAH

customer_reviews.title: defective product
customer_reviews.text: defective product, it is not 5 months since I bought it and the batteries do not work anymore, having a moderate use and they have already been damaged
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Batteries don't stay charged for too long.
customer_reviews.text: I thought buying this would be very convenient so I could stop buying batteries and in that aspect, it was. The issue I have with this is that the batteries are only good for a couple hours. They even die if you don't use the controllers and I find that very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: LuciaLJ

customer_reviews.title: Dont order
customer_reviews.text: Lasted about a month, then quit charging and remotes wont work with regular batteries in them
customer_reviews.author: mommacass

customer_reviews.title: Short cord, but good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Cord is super short, other than that does what I needed it to do and keeps charged for a good amount of play time!
customer_reviews.author: Kim P.

customer_reviews.title: Wii charger
customer_reviews.text: We bought a cheaper one before. Broke in no time. We have owned this one quite a while. Work great, still going!
customer_reviews.author: tkgrma

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: It is so difficult and annoying to get the batteries to charge. I have to movie the controller a lot to get it to charge.
customer_reviews.author: Sochil

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for four months before and never had any issues with it
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Pritchett

customer_reviews.title: One battery works, the other stopped.
customer_reviews.text: They work, except after a week or so, the second battery wouldn't keep a charge and every now and again makes the light blink really fast. I'm not sure if the one battery is just defective or what but it will not charge.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Charging cable way too short
customer_reviews.text: The charging cord is incredibly short, it is very difficult to plug it in and have it reach to where the kids can access.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest Lasen

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done. Touchy contacts
customer_reviews.text: Only issue I have with this product is that sometimes the contacts can be a little touchy and don’t make enough contact to charge. For the most part it gets the job done though.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Wish both batteries worked
customer_reviews.text: One of the two batteries work good. The other doesn't take a charge in either of the charging ports.
customer_reviews.author: taureaan redic

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: My wii remote was using batteries like crazy, this is so easy to use and charges both my remotes
customer_reviews.author: shaunie

customer_reviews.title: life back in the ole console!
customer_reviews.text: Charger keeps our wiimotes fully charged and ready for that impromptu party or race challenge from the grandkids
customer_reviews.author: Russell W.

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: The charger works awesome it gives me a lot of playing time
customer_reviews.author: daniel medeiros

customer_reviews.text: only 1 of the batteries work. But the one that does work is great.
customer_reviews.author: firelily

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: It arrived and never worked. Then I contacted the company and they said they have no more inventory to replace it and there is nothing else they can do. I am not very happy
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Nicholls

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Charging after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Stopped charging and only blinks red light after 2 months!!!
customer_reviews.author: Traci & Mike

customer_reviews.title: work great
customer_reviews.text: got them when they said and they worked out great,
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Kay Keeney

customer_reviews.title: Great Wii mote Charging Station!
customer_reviews.text: These have worked for me so far and really saves me money on buying batteries for my wiimote. I do recommend buying this charging station if you have the money because they work suprisingly well.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle N.

customer_reviews.title: It works!! And it was easy to set up but the instructions was there if needed.
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, product as described. Very satisfied 😊. And yes my family and I still play the Wii. Thanks for having what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jaquetta

customer_reviews.title: Work Great! Charge lasts a long time~
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use and batteries last a long time without charge in between
customer_reviews.author: Luz Clarita Del Angel Serrano

customer_reviews.title: Best Wii remote charger out there
customer_reviews.text: I have gone through 3 different Wii remote chargers. Out of all of those this is by far my favorite one. There is a space for the wrist strap so that it does not get in the way of charging.
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Just as described and it's an excellent product on a budget. Just loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Sarante

customer_reviews.title: Buy last longer recharging batteries.
customer_reviews.text: Charge fast. But comes with 2 batteries power doesn't last long . Approx 20 mins then gonna charge again.
customer_reviews.author: chad ray

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Work like a charm, only side down is it didnt come with a charger to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy it again
customer_reviews.text: The charger stopped working so it's pretty much a waste of space right now
customer_reviews.author: Austin Allen

customer_reviews.title: still going strong!
customer_reviews.text: The best official energizer Wii or Wii U remote charging set for 2 controllers. This is our second set and our 1st is still working after three years with our old Wii system.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan F.

customer_reviews.title: No good.
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed. Doesn't hold a charge and one part doesn't charge at all 🤦🏻‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: kinda poor choice on the usb
customer_reviews.text: works ok, only problem is that the charger is usb, so if you plan on having it plugged into your wii u, it will stop charging when the wii u turns off.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua C. Carr

customer_reviews.title: Good product but need a better plan
customer_reviews.text: Do not like that it only charges when the WiiU is turned on. When the unit is on that is because we are playing on it. I had to buy 2 extra controllers to use while the batteries are charging on the the other ones and alternate them as we use the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Angi

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: My wii controllers kept dying every 15 minutes so I bought this and the battery lasts for hours !
customer_reviews.author: Anita R.

customer_reviews.title: Working well
customer_reviews.text: Charger works well however it only came with a usb charging cable, was expecting to plug it into an electrical outlet. But so far the charger is working as it should
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Came with everything pictured. Just what I needed works great. Fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Wii Remote Charger
customer_reviews.text: Works well and charges fast! Only takes about 30 minutes to charge both remotes.
customer_reviews.author: Jellyman

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's alright, but the batteries don't hold a charge for long. shame.
customer_reviews.author: Cori

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great don’t have to use batteries anymore. Charge hold is okay. Shipping was fast
customer_reviews.author: jennifer t.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product!
customer_reviews.text: This charging dock does fit our Wii remotes! As well as the battery packs! Pretty convenient because you won't have to worry about swapping out the batteries constantly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wii Remote Charging Station.
customer_reviews.text: This item is great, and has saved me enormously without the need for countless double A batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery Tippins

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great station and recharges quickly. The conductors are a little touchy but besides that, wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Great product great price. Works great
customer_reviews.text: Finally bought this . I should have bought it years ago to save money on batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Rx Gadget

customer_reviews.title: one cahrger broke straight away
customer_reviews.text: one of the charging stations broke in the first week, managed to fix it myself , not impressed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The contact between remotes and charger is not terribly positive -- I sometimes need to re-set the remote ...
customer_reviews.text: The contact between remotes and charger is not terribly positive -- I sometimes need to re-set the remote to get it to charge.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Batteries hold a really good charge. I'd buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: CHARDY

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Few weeks after buying these and the batteries don't stay charged for more then 15 min.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works really well just like I had hoped. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Michael R.

customer_reviews.title: Works well but would be nice if it came with the adapter plug
customer_reviews.text: Works well but would be nice if it came with the adapter plug,I had to go out & purchase an adapter so I could start using it
customer_reviews.author: Mary Willinger

customer_reviews.title: WII Essentials
customer_reviews.text: My best friend bought these. They were also available at Game Stop, but I chose to by them here. They charge quickly and so far have lasted. I have not thrown out the original battery backs, but this is a good addition to our WII and nice to have when my son has friends over.
customer_reviews.author: MonetDM

customer_reviews.title: Wii charging station
customer_reviews.text: Positive experience, item came quick and was as described. I would buy from them again. The charging station worlds great I had one and needed another for a total of four charging stations. The way my kids go through batteries this charging station saves us a lot of money.
customer_reviews.author: Gharrington

customer_reviews.title: Great charging system
customer_reviews.text: The battery of this system is great. It lasts hours and the charging system doesn't heat. Just be careful to put the batteries correctly before their use because if not they could heat
customer_reviews.author: Oscar

customer_reviews.title: Received 2 faulty products.
customer_reviews.text: The product worked for a few days, then it no longer charges. one of the charging ports stopped working, the LED blinks red. I tried using a different outlet and a different controller on the charging port and the problem persisted. I requested a replacement, the replacement suffered from the same problem. It only worked for a few days. I am requesting a refund for this product and buying something else.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Not charging anymore
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t last very long; maybe a few months. Can’t seem to get them to charge.
customer_reviews.author: Empty

customer_reviews.title: Love not ever having to replace batteries again
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper than at Walmart . Love not ever having to replace batteries again .
customer_reviews.author: Ash-hole

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: It did not come with an AC adaptor as stated and it only worked for minutes before the charger gave out. Based on my experience and other reviews I do not recommend you buy this item.
customer_reviews.author: BergPlz

customer_reviews.title: Blinking Red - won't charge
customer_reviews.text: First time we used it it was fine. Charged with green lights as a go. But then when trying again it blinked red and wouldn't charge them. I asked for replacement and it's again not working and doing the same thing of not charging.
customer_reviews.author: Callista Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Not acceptable
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a new item and received a damaged, used item with parts missing. Not even remotely close to acceptable
customer_reviews.author: spinner46

customer_reviews.title: too bad.
customer_reviews.text: did not charge. seems to be a connection issue from the cord to the dock. charging light would not stay on; therefore not charging remotes. tried to return for a new one but had the same results with the second. too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Williams

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT buy this product – it is terrible
customer_reviews.text: I brought this on January 12, 2016. It is three months old and already one of the batteries does not maintain its charge. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: michael s faber

customer_reviews.title: NO AC Adapter!!!
customer_reviews.text: Contrary to the description, this item does NOT come with an AC adapter! It comes with a short 2' 5V DC to USB cable which must be plugged into the console or an adapter provided by the customer.
customer_reviews.author: M. Potter

customer_reviews.title: It didn't come with no controller and the battery pack ...
customer_reviews.text: It didn't come with no controller and the battery pack don't fit in the back I need a controller
customer_reviews.author: timmy McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: I really like this
customer_reviews.text: I like this charging station is handy and small easy to used and it fit just fine
customer_reviews.author: Anngie

product_meta.title: PDP Energizer 2X Charging System - Nintendo Wii
product_meta.description: Keep your Nintendo controllers charged and ready for game play with this Energizer Power & Play Charging System for Wii. Includes charging dock, 2 rechargeable battery packs, 2 battery covers for your Wii remote.
feature_bullets: Charge 2 Nintendo Wii U or Wii wireless controllers simultaneously and twice as fast
Charging station comes with an USB cord and 2 Energizer Rechargeable Battery Packs for up to 10 hours of playtime
Plug USB cord into Wii U or Wii and ensure that console is on to activate charging power
Replace controller batteries with Energizer ones and then simply dock controllers in charging station- green light indicates when they are completely charged

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars389 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
